HIG Loyalty Program

Discover & experience a whole new hospitality experience through our member benefits.

Find Your Room

BOOK NOW
Join Today

Free Membership!

Already a member? Log in now

to see how many points you have and to make the most of your benefits

As soon as you enter the AccorHotels loyalty programme, we are there to offer exclusive services and special attention during your entire stay. Whether on holiday or travelling for business, we do everything we can to meet your needs and make your trips as pleasant as possible.

Discover HIG Group Loyalty Program Benefits

Exclusive
Rates

Enjoy exclusive rates 48 hours before everyone else, twice a year.

Room
Upgrade

Enjoy an upgrade to the next best available room.

POINT
REWARDS

Use your points to enjoy a free night’s stay at any time of the year. For 2,000 Rewards points collected, you get a €40 discount.

How is Your Status Determined?

On joining the programme, you will be automatically awarded Classic status

You progress to the next Status level by completing stays at hotels that have enrolled to participate in the Hotel Indonesia group programme

You unlock new benefits each time you progress to a new Status level

The Main Benefits Associated with Each Status

Classic - on joining the programme

  • Online check-in, fast check-out
  • Other partner advantages
  • Member’s rate up to 10 % extra off

Silver - free 10 nights on eligible expenses

  • Online check-in, fast check-out
  • Other partner advantages
  • Member’s rate up to 10 % extra off

GOLD - free 10 nights on eligible expenses

  • Online check-in, fast check-out
  • Other partner advantages
  • Member’s rate up to 10 % extra off

PLATINUM - free 10 nights on eligible expenses

  • Online check-in, fast check-out
  • Other partner advantages
  • Member’s rate up to 10 % extra off
